channel.title: Optimized algorithm for color selection
channel.description:
Hi.
Found interesting article about how to pick colors for charts: https://matthewstrom.com/writing/how-to-pick-the-least-wrong-colors/. Now it could be very useful because there is no option to set colors from code to make all widgets in dashboard similar.
The repo is available here: https://github.com/ilikescience/category-colors
